manifest_description.message: This extension protects you from tweets that you feel are harassing or threatening by "your standards".

browser_action_include_user_name.message: Include User Names in the NG Word Detection

browser_action_include_verified_account.message: Include Verified Accounts in the Audit

advanced_setting_export_description.message: Exports the settings of the Spam Tweets Compressor. You can copy them to the clipboard or save them to a file.

advanced_setting_ng_word_description1.message: Input NG Words. To input multiple items, separate them with a new line. No distinction is made between uppercase and lowercase letters, or between katakana and hiragana.

advanced_setting_ng_word_description2.message: Also, when using regular expressions, enclose the beginning and end of the NG word with /, and write the regular expression flag after the ending /.

advanced_setting_allow_list_description.message: Users whose user IDs are input here will be excluded from the spam detection. If you want to specify multiple user IDs, separate them with a new line.

advanced_setting_exclude_url_description.message: Disable the extension for the specified URL. To input multiple URLs, separate them with a new line.

advanced_setting_advanced_filters_descri.message: You can enable or disable the "Advanced Filters" that hides spam and spoofing against specific female idols and streamers. It works by using various information such as specific words, hashtags, and URLs contained in tweets.

Note: Advanced Filters will produce false positives and false negatives. Also, each filter is optimized for its own purpose, and false positives and false negatives will increase when used for other purposes.
Overview of how filters work and description of each filter

advanced_setting_reset_description.message: Resets all settings of Spam Tweets Compressor to the state it was in when it was installed.

advanced_setting_reset_confirm.message: This will reset all settings of Spam Tweets Compressor to the state it was in when it was installed. Are you sure?

decompress_button_strict_with_reason.message: Show a tweet by $USER_NAME$ ($USER_ID$) (reason for judgementï¼š$REASON$)

error_message_user_id_bug.message: Spam Tweets Compressor has failed to retrieve the user ID of a tweet. If possible, please report this as a bug to the extension store or the GitHub repository.
